snippet.title: Hacking sexual pleasure: a hard, slippery problem
snippet.description:
Hacking sexual pleasure: a hard, slippery problem
Everyone wants more pleasure with less effort, so humans have used mechanical augmentation for ages: prehistoric dildos and porn, Kama Sutra treatises, lubes, piercings, and lately vibrators and Viagra. But since sex is really all about electrical nerve impulses, shouldn't electronics and signal processing be able to enhance …
Bill Softky, 28 May 2007

snippet.title: How long does it take the body to...
snippet.description:
How long does it take the body to...
Also in this week's column: How long does it take the body to...(Part two) Do our ears grow longer with age? Do we still remove the appendix as often as we used to? Part One: How long does it take the body to... It takes time for everything, including what happens in the human body. Fingerprints form six to eight weeks …
Stephen Juan, 26 May 2006
